channel.title: SoulSplit Custom Items (Platebody) Glitch
channel.description:
Hello Guys, I Got The Soul-split Source And I Am Having A Hard Time With My Custom's
I Don't Want To Post The Itemdef.java Codes Here Because The Whole World Will Copy Me And Take Credit For It.
Well Heres A Picture Of How It Looks Like When I Wear Vesta\Statius\Zuriel\Morrigan Plate-body.
My Friend Explained To Me That This Is A "Model Glitch", I Don't Know Hot To Fix It... I Would Be Really Glad If Someone Would Take A Few Minutes To Answer My Post.

item.title: SoulSplit Custom Items (Platebody) Glitch
item.dc:creator: @flentman flentman
item.description:

Hello Guys, I Got The Soul-split Source And I Am Having A Hard Time With My Custom’s

I Don’t Want To Post The Itemdef.java Codes Here Because The Whole World Will Copy Me And Take Credit For It.
